solution_line_template: Janice walks up {flights_per_trip} flights of stairs {up_trips} times per day, for a total of {flights_per_trip}*{up_trips} = <<{flights_per_trip}*{up_trips}={up_flights}>>{up_flights} flights of stairs

Janice walks down {flights_per_trip} flights of stairs {down_trips} times per day, for a total of {flights_per_trip}*{down_trips} = <<{flights_per_trip}*{down_trips}={down_flights}>>{down_flights} flights of stairs
In total, she walks {up_flights}+{down_flights}=<<{up_flights}+{down_flights}={total_flights}>>{total_flights} flights of stairs in a single day
